CustomField.formula: IF(OR(TEXT(Industry)="Banking and Financial Services",TEXT(Industry)="Healthcare", TEXT(Industry)="Information Technology and Services",TEXT(Industry)="Insurance",TEXT(Industry)="Manufacturing",TEXT(Industry)="Consulting",TEXT(Industry)="Telecommunications",TEXT(Industry)="Financial Services",TEXT(Industry)="Energy",TEXT(Industry)="Retail",TEXT(Industry)="Technology",TEXT(Industry)="Government",TEXT(Industry)="Transportation",TEXT(Industry)="Utilities"),10, IF(OR(TEXT(Industry)="Food & Beverage",TEXT(Industry)="Communications",TEXT(Industry)="Media",TEXT(Industry)="Machinery",TEXT(Industry)="Public Sector",TEXT(Industry)="Automotive",TEXT(Industry)="Healthcare Payers",TEXT(Industry)="Healthcare LS",TEXT(Industry)="Engineering",TEXT(Industry)="Staffing & Recruiting services",TEXT(Industry)="Entertainment",TEXT(Industry)="Recreation",TEXT(Industry)="Apparel"),7, IF(OR(TEXT(Industry)="Other",TEXT(Industry)="Others",TEXT(Industry)="Construction",TEXT(Industry)="Chemicals",TEXT(Industry)="Electronics",TEXT(Industry)="Education",TEXT(Industry)="Pharmaceuticals",TEXT(Industry)="Legal",TEXT(Industry)="Biotechnology",TEXT(Industry)="Hospitality",TEXT(Industry)="Healthcare Providers",TEXT(Industry)="Industrial chemicals",TEXT(Industry)="Not For Profit",TEXT(Industry)="Environmental",TEXT(Industry)="Healthcare Gov", TEXT(Industry)="Shipping"),4,1)))
CustomField.label: Industry Score
